name: Dissidia 012 Prologus: Final Fantasy
overview: Cosmos versus Chaos Harmony and discord clash once more in DISSIDIA 012[duodecim] FINAL FANTASY for PSP, as the gods Cosmos and Chaos struggle against each other in an eternal cycle of life, death and rebirth. The warring gods call upon the heroes and villains of the FINAL FANTASY series to try to tip the scales in their favour, in a superbly rewarding hybrid of the fighting and role-playing genres. It's a classic battle of light against dark, an endless fight which these FINAL FANTASY stars have decided to finish once and for all. Drama is handled with effortless style smooth cutscenes dazzle, dialogue bristles with age-old rivalries and the combat itself reflects the highly individual techniques favoured by each member of this glittering cast. Master the challenge of the gods to unearth a game of incredible depth. Not only are there countless special attacks and costumes to unlock for each of the 30-plus characters, but the entire Campaign Mode of DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY, the forerunner to this game, is included as a truly staggering bonus. Fusing an unforgettable cast with a torrent of special features, DISSIDIA 012[duodecim] FINAL FANTASY is a must-have for your PSP. * Choose your favourite Final Fantasy heroes and villains to take into combat in this amazing follow-up to DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY. * Includes new characters from FINAL FANTASY lore to fight with, such as Lightning from Final Fantasy XIII. * Discover the story behind the 12th battle, a new war between Cosmos and Chaos.
